dialogue.name: Yvyteph Wild Intro Root
lines: Why hello, Miss Maya. I am Yvyteph's Wildness; I'm sure you've found our other aspects quite tame. How are the trials coming along?

dialogue.name: Maya Is Confusion
lines: Hi! Yep, I'm Maya, like you already... said. Glad to meet you!
The trials are comin' along, I think? Not really sure what's expected of me.

choices.text: What do you want from me?

dialogue.name: Maya Weariness
lines: What do you goddessy folks want from me? What's my goal in these trials?

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Coy
lines: We already have most of what we want from you; your desire and your conception of this mortal goddess of yours named Molly.
The trials are more of a bonus -- we wish to see how you handle yourself in a survival situation where desires meet upon a battlefield where the stakes are life and death.

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Wild Advice
lines: Simply analyze your foe and learn what he desires, and then use it to control him. It is the blueprint of every conflict.

dialogue.name: Maya Stranger Danger
lines: I don't like the sound of that. I prefer to focus on happy desires and kindness to grow a garden of love in my sphere of influence.
At least when no one's trying to kill me.
thoughts: This lady really needs to chill a bit. The fire makes that seem unlikely.

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Wild Slyness
lines: But someone is trying to kill you. A whole world, in fact. So let's see what you do in a context of wanton brutality!
You've noticed that you can pick up some objects and throw them, yes? Perhaps you should consider how that might relate to your foe's desires...
thoughts: She is going to be flattened by my pet. Ah well, at least it will be an entertaining chase.

dialogue.name: Maya Curious
lines: How come you're on fire? I thought you were a naturey forest spirit of some sort. Forests usually don't get along with fire.

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Wild Fire
lines: Fire is a part of nature, for forests as much as anything else. My longing burns away what is stale and forgotten, and my passion calls new life into being!
thoughts: I wonder if she can even imagine just how hot I can be? *giggle* She won't need to imagine, soon enough.
